hero.title: Bloom
hero.subtitle: We transform ideas into <1>successful MVPs</1> and <2>revolutionary startups</2>. Web development, UX/UI design, and prototypes that drive the future.

services.title: Our Services
services.mvp_desc: We launch your minimum viable product in record time.
services.web_dev_desc: Modern, fast, and scalable web applications.
services.backend_desc: Robust and efficient systems to power your application.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.project_alpha_desc: An e-commerce platform for a fashion startup.
portfolio.project_beta_desc: Mobile application for personal finance management.
portfolio.project_gamma_desc: Data analysis dashboard for a logistics company.
portfolio.project_epsilon_desc: Reservation system for a restaurant chain.

readiness.title: Readiness <1>Test</1>
readiness.subtitle: Find out if your project is ready for development
readiness.result_ready_desc: You have a solid foundation to start building your project. Contact us to take the next step.
readiness.result_almost_desc: You have a good idea, but there are some areas we can polish together. A consulting session could be very useful.
readiness.result_ideation_desc: You are in an early stage, and it is the perfect time to define a solid strategy! We can help you shape your idea.
readiness.q1: Do you have a clear idea of your product or service?
readiness.q1_o4: No, I only have a vague idea
readiness.q2: Have you defined your target audience?
readiness.q2_o3: No, I don't know where to start
readiness.q3: Do you have an assigned budget?
readiness.q4: What is your estimated launch date?
readiness.q5: Do you have a team or co-founders?
readiness.q5_o4: I'm in the process of training

contact.title: Let's talk about your Project
contact.subtitle: Complete the form or contact us directly. We are here to help you build the future.
